words.translation: Kaaf Ha Ya Ain Sad

translations.1: Kaaaf-Haa-Yaa-'Ayyyn-Saaad
translations.2: K<u>a</u>fh<u>a</u>y<u>a</u>AAayn<u>sa</u>d

words.translation: (A) mention|(of the) Mercy|(of) your Lord|(to) His servant|Zakariya

translations.1: Zikru rahmati Rabbika 'abdahoo Zakariyya
translations.2: <u>Th</u>ikru ra<u>h</u>mati rabbika AAabdahu zakariyy<u>a</u>

words.translation: When|he called|(to) his Lord|a call|secret

translations.1: Iz naadaa Rabbahoo nidaaa'an khafiyyaa
translations.2: Ith nada rabbahu nidaan khafiyyan

words.translation: He said|My Lord|Indeed, [I]|(have) weakened|my bones|my bones|and flared|(my) head|(with) white|and not|I have been|in (my) supplication (to) You|my Lord|unblessed

translations.1: Qaala Rabbi innee wahanal 'azmu minnee washta-'alar ra'su shaibanw Wa-lam akun bidu'aaa'ika Rabbi shaqiyyaa
translations.2: Qala rabbi innee wahana alAAathmu minnee waishtaAAala alrrasu shayban walam akun biduAAaika rabbi shaqiyyan

words.translation: And indeed, I|[I] fear|the successors|after me|after me|and is|my wife|barren|So give|[to] me|from|Yourself|an heir

translations.1: Wa-innee khiftul mawaaliya minw waraaa'ee Wa-kaanat imra atee 'aqiran fa-hablee mil ladunka waliyyaa
translations.2: Wainnee khiftu almawaliya min waraee wakanati imraatee AAaqiran fahab lee min ladunka waliyyan

words.translation: Who will inherit me|and inherit|from|(the) family|(of) Yaqub|And make him|my Lord|pleasing

translations.1: Yarisunee Wa-yarisu min aali Ya'qoob, waj'alhu Rabbi radiyya
translations.2: Yarithunee wayarithu min ali yaAAqooba waijAAalhu rabbi radiyyan

words.translation: O Zakariya|Indeed, We|[We] give you glad tidings|of a boy|his name|(will be) Yahya|not|We (have) assigned|[for] it|before|before|(this) name

translations.1: Yaa-Zakariyyaaa innaa nubashshiruka bi-ghulaamin ismuhoo Yahyaa lam naj'al lahoo min qablu samiyyaa
translations.2: Ya zakariyya inna nubashshiruka bighulamin ismuhu yahya lam najAAal lahu min qablu samiyyan

words.translation: He said|My Lord!|How|can|I have|a boy|while is|my wife|barren|and indeed|I have reached|of|the old age|extreme

translations.1: Qaala Rabbi annaa yakoonu lee ghulaamunw Wa-kaanat imra-atee 'aaqiranw Wa-qad balaghtu minal kibari 'itiyyaa
translations.2: Qala rabbi anna yakoonu lee ghulamun wakanati imraatee AAaqiran waqad balaghtu mina alkibari AAitiyyan

words.translation: He said|Thus|said|your Lord|It|(is) easy for Me|(is) easy for Me|and certainly|I (have) created you|before|before|while not|you were|anything

translations.1: Qaala kazaalika qaala Rabbuka huwa 'alaiya haiyinunw Wa-qad khalaqtuka min qablu Wa-lam taku shai'aa
translations.2: Qala kathalika qala rabbuka huwa AAalayya hayyinun waqad khalaqtuka min qablu walam taku shayan

words.translation: He said|My Lord!|Make|for me|a sign|He said|Your sign|(is) that not|you will speak|(to) the people|(for) three|nights|sound

translations.1: Qaala Rabbij 'al leee Aayah; qaala Aayatuka allaa tukalliman naasa salaasa layaalin sawiyyaa
translations.2: Qala rabbi ijAAal lee ayatan qala ayatuka alla tukallima alnnasa thalatha layalin sawiyyan

words.translation: Then he came out|to|his people|from|the prayer chamber|and he signaled|to them|to|glorify (Allah)|(in) the morning|and (in) the evening

translations.1: Fakharaja 'alaa qawmihee minal mihraabi fa-awhaaa ilaihim an sabbihoo bukratanw Wa-'ashiyyaa
translations.2: Fakharaja AAala qawmihi mina almihrabi faawha ilayhim an sabbihoo bukratan waAAashiyyan

words.translation: O Yahya!|Hold|the Scripture|with strength|And We gave him|[the] wisdom|(when he was) a child

translations.1: Yaa-Yahyaa khuzil Kitaaba biquwwatinw Wa-aatainaahul hukma sabiyyaa
translations.2: Ya yahya khuthi alkitaba biquwwatin waataynahu alhukma sabiyyan

words.translation: And affection|from|Us|and purity|and he was|righteous

translations.1: Wa-hanaanam mil ladunnaa Wa-zakaatanw Wa-kaana taqiyyaa
translations.2: Wahananan min ladunna wazakatan wakana taqiyyan

words.translation: And dutiful|to his parents|and not|he was|a tyrant|disobedient

translations.1: Wa-barram biwaalidayhi Wa-lam yakum jabbaaran 'asiyyaa
translations.2: Wabarran biwalidayhi walam yakun jabbaran AAasiyyan

words.translation: And peace be|upon him|(the) day|he was born|and (the) day|he dies|and (the) day|he will be raised|alive

translations.1: Wa-salaamun 'alaihi yawma wulida Wa-yawma yamootu Wa-yawma yub'asu haiyyaa
translations.2: Wasalamun AAalayhi yawma wulida wayawma yamootu wayawma yubAAathu hayyan

words.translation: And mention|in|the Book|Maryam|when|she withdrew|from|her family|(to) a place|eastern

translations.1: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Maryma; izin tabazat min ahlihaa makaanan sharqiyyaa
translations.2: Waothkur fee alkitabi maryama ithi intabathat min ahliha makanan sharqiyyan

words.translation: Then she took|from them|from them|a screen|Then We sent|to her|Our Spirit|then he assumed the likeness|for her|(of) a man|well-proportioned

translations.1: Fattakhazat min doonihim hijaaban fa-arsalnaaa ilaihaa roohanaa fatamassala lahaa basharan sawiyyaa
translations.2: Faittakhathat min doonihim hijaban faarsalna ilayha roohana fatamaththala laha basharan sawiyyan

words.translation: She said|Indeed I|[I] seek refuge|with the Most Gracious|from you|if|you are|God fearing

translations.1: Qaalat inneee a'oozu bir-Rahmaani minka in kunta taqiyyaa
translations.2: Qalat innee aAAoothu bialrrahmani minka in kunta taqiyyan

words.translation: He said|Only|I am|a Messenger|(from) your Lord|that I (may) bestow|on you|a son|pure

translations.1: Qaala innamaa ana rasoolu Rabbiki li-ahaba laki ghulaaman zakiyyaa
translations.2: Qala innama ana rasoolu rabbiki liahaba laki ghulaman zakiyyan

words.translation: She said|How|can be|for me|a son|when not|has touched me|a man|and not|I am|unchaste

translations.1: Qaalat anna yakoonu lee ghulaamunw Wa-lam yamsasnee bashrunw Wa-lam aku baghiyyaa
translations.2: Qalat anna yakoonu lee ghulamun walam yamsasnee basharun walam aku baghiyyan

words.translation: He said|Thus|said|your Lord|It|(is) for Me|easy|and so that We will make him|a sign|for the mankind|and a Mercy|from Us|And (it) is|a matter|decreed

translations.1: Qaala kazaaliki qaala Rabbuki huwa 'alaiya haiyyimunw Wa-linaj-'alahooo Aayatal linnaasi Wa-rahmatam minnaa; Wa-kaana amram maqdiyyaa
translations.2: Qala kathaliki qala rabbuki huwa AAalayya hayyinun walinajAAalahu ayatan lilnnasi warahmatan minna wakana amran maqdiyyan

words.translation: So she conceived him|and she withdrew|with him|(to) a place|remote

translations.1: Fahamalat-hu fantabazat bihee makaanan qasiyyaa
translations.2: Fahamalathu faintabathat bihi makanan qasiyyan

words.translation: Then drove her|the pains of childbirth|to|(the) trunk|(of) the date-palm|She said|O! I wish|I (had) died|before|this|and I was|(in) oblivion|forgotten

translations.1: Fa-ajaaa-'ahal makhaadu ilaa jiz'in nakhlati qaalat yaa-laitanee mittu qabla haazaa Wa-kuntu nasyam mansiyyaa
translations.2: Faajaaha almakhadu ila jithAAi alnnakhlati qalat ya laytanee mittu qabla hatha wakuntu nasyan mansiyyan

words.translation: So cried to her|from|beneath her|That (do) not|grieve|verily|(has) placed|your Lord|beneath you|a stream

translations.1: Fanaadaahaa min tahtihaaa allaa tahzanee qad ja'ala Rabbuki tahtaki sariyyaa
translations.2: Fanadaha min tahtiha alla tahzanee qad jaAAala rabbuki tahtaki sariyyan

words.translation: And shake|towards you|(the) trunk|(of) the date-palm|it will drop|upon you|fresh dates|ripe

translations.1: Wa-huzzeee ilaiki bijiz-'in nakhlati tusaaqit 'alaiki rutaban janiyyaa
translations.2: Wahuzzee ilayki bijithAAi alnnakhlati tusaqit AAalayki rutaban janiyyan

words.translation: So eat|and drink|and cool|(your) eyes|And if|you see|from|human being|anyone|then say|Indeed I|[I] have vowed|to the Most Gracious|a fast|so not|I will speak|today|(to any) human being

translations.1: Fakulee washrabee Wa-qarree 'ainaa; fa-immaa tarayinnna minal bashari ahadan faqooleee innee nazartu lir-Rahmaani sawman falan ukallimal yawma insiyyaa
translations.2: Fakulee waishrabee waqarree AAaynan faimma tarayinna mina albashari ahadan faqoolee innee nathartu lilrrahmani sawman falan okallima alyawma insiyyan

words.translation: Then she came|with him|(to) her people|carrying him|They said|O Maryam|Certainly|you (have) brought|an amazing thing|an amazing thing

translations.1: Fa-atat bihee qawmahaa tahmiluhoo qaaloo yaa-Maryamoo laqad ji'ti shai'an fariyyaa
translations.2: Faatat bihi qawmaha tahmiluhu qaloo ya maryamu laqad jiti shayan fariyyan

words.translation: O sister|(of) Harun|Not|was|your father|an evil man|an evil man|and not|was|your mother|unchaste

translations.1: Yaaa-ukhta Haaroona maa kaana abooki mra'a saw'inw Wa-maa kaanat ummuki baghiyyaa
translations.2: Ya okhta haroona ma kana abooki imraa sawin wama kanat ommuki baghiyyan

words.translation: Then she pointed|to him|They said|How|(can) we speak|(to one) who|is|in|the cradle|a child

translations.1: Fa-ashaarat ilaih; qaaloo kaifa nukallimu man kaana fil mahdi sabiyyaa
translations.2: Faasharat ilayhi qaloo kayfa nukallimu man kana fee almahdi sabiyyan

words.translation: He said|Indeed I am|a slave|(of) Allah|He gave me|the Scripture|and made me|a Prophet

translations.1: Qaala innee 'abdul laahi aataaniyal Kitaaba Wa-ja'alanee Nabiyyaa
translations.2: Qala innee AAabdu Allahi ataniya alkitaba wajaAAalanee nabiyyan

words.translation: And He (has) made me|blessed|wherever|wherever|I am|and has enjoined (on) me|[of] the prayer|and zakah|as long as I am|as long as I am|alive

translations.1: Wa-ja'alanee mubaarakan aina maa kuntu Wa-awsaanee bis-Salaati waz-Zakaati maa dumtu haiyaa
translations.2: WajaAAalanee mubarakan ayna ma kuntu waawsanee bialssalati waalzzakati ma dumtu hayyan

words.translation: And dutiful|to my mother|and not|He (has) made me|insolent|unblessed

translations.1: Wa-barram biwaalidatee Wa-lam yaj'alnee jabbaaran shaqiyyaa
translations.2: Wabarran biwalidatee walam yajAAalnee jabbaran shaqiyyan

words.translation: And peace (be)|on me|(the) day|I was born|and (the) day|I will die|and (the) Day|I will be raised|alive

translations.1: Wassalaamu 'alaiya yawma wulidtu Wa-yawma amootu Wa-yawma ub'asu haiyaa
translations.2: Waalssalamu AAalayya yawma wulidtu wayawma amootu wayawma obAAathu hayyan

words.translation: That|(was) Isa|(the) son|(of) Maryam|a statement|(of) truth|that which|about it|they dispute

translations.1: Zaalika 'Eesab nu Maryama; qawlal haqqil lazee feehi yamtaroon
translations.2: Thalika AAeesa ibnu maryama qawla alhaqqi allathee feehi yamtaroona

words.translation: Not|(it) is|for Allah|that|He should take|any son|any son|Glory be to Him|When|He decrees|a matter|then only|He says|to it|Be|and it is

translations.1: Maa kaana lillaahi aien yattakhiza minw waladin Subhaanah; izaa qadaaa amran fa-innamaa yaqoolu lahoo kun fa-yakoon
translations.2: Ma kana lillahi an yattakhitha min waladin subhanahu itha qada amran fainnama yaqoolu lahu kun fayakoonu

words.translation: And indeed|Allah|(is) my Lord|and your Lord|so worship Him|This|(is) a path|straight

translations.1: Wa-innal laaha Rabbee Wa-Rabbukum fa'budooh; haazaa Siraatum Mustaqeem
translations.2: Wainna Allaha rabbee warabbukum faoAAbudoohu hatha siratun mustaqeemun

words.translation: But differed|the sects|from among them|from among them|so woe|to those who|disbelieve|from|(the) witnessing|(of) a Day|great

translations.1: Fakhtalafal ahzaabu min bainihim fawailul lillazeena kafaroo min mashhadi Yawmin 'azeem
translations.2: Faikhtalafa alahzabu min baynihim fawaylun lillatheena kafaroo min mashhadi yawmin AAatheemin

words.translation: How they will hear|How they will hear|and how (they will) see|(the) Day|they will come to Us|but|the wrongdoers|today|(are) in|error|clear

translations.1: Asmi' bihim Wa-absir Yawma ya'toonanaa laakiniz zaalimoonal yawma fee dalaalin mubeen
translations.2: AsmiAA bihim waabsir yawma yatoonana lakini alththalimoona alyawma fee dalalin mubeenin

words.translation: And warn them|(of the) Day|(of) the Regret|when|has been decided|the matter|And they|(are) in|heedlessness|and they|(do) not|believe

translations.1: Wa-anzirhum Yawmal hasrati iz qudiyal amr; Wa-hum fee ghaflatinw Wa-hum laa yu'minoon
translations.2: Waanthirhum yawma alhasrati ith qudiya alamru wahum fee ghaflatin wahum la yuminoona

words.translation: Indeed We|[We]|[We] will inherit|the earth|and whoever|(is) on it|and to Us|they will be returned

translations.1: Innaa nahnu narisul arda Wa-man 'alaihaa Wa-ilainaa yurja'oon
translations.2: Inna nahnu narithu alarda waman AAalayha wailayna yurjaAAoona

words.translation: And mention|in|the Book|Ibrahim|Indeed he|was|a man of truth|a Prophet

translations.1: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Ibraaheem; innahoo kaana siddeeqan Nabiyyaa
translations.2: Waothkur fee alkitabi ibraheema innahu kana siddeeqan nabiyyan

words.translation: When|he said|to his father|O my father!|Why|(do) you worship|that which|not|hears|and not|sees|and not|benefits|[to] you|(in) anything

translations.1: Iz qaala li-abeehi yaaa-abati lima ta'budu maa laa yasma'u Wa-laa yubsiru Wa-laa yughnee 'anka shai'aa
translations.2: Ith qala liabeehi ya abati lima taAAbudu ma la yasmaAAu wala yubsiru wala yughnee AAanka shayan

words.translation: O my father!|Indeed [I]|verily|(has) come to me|of|the knowledge|what|not|came to you|so follow me|I will guide you|(to) the path|even

translations.1: Yaaa-abati innee qad jaaa'anee minal 'ilmi maa lam ya'tika fattabi'neee ahdika siraatan Sawiyyaa
translations.2: Ya abati innee qad jaanee mina alAAilmi ma lam yatika faittabiAAnee ahdika siratan sawiyyan

words.translation: O my father!|(Do) not|worship|the Shaitaan|Indeed|the Shaitaan|is|to the Most Gracious|disobedient

translations.1: Yaaa-abati laa ta'budish Shaitaan; innash Shaitaana kaana lir-Rahmaani 'asiyyaa
translations.2: Ya abati la taAAbudi alshshaytana inna alshshaytana kana lilrrahmani AAasiyyan

words.translation: O my father!|Indeed I|[I] fear|that|will touch you|a punishment|from|the Most Gracious|so you would be|to the Shaitaan|a friend

translations.1: Yaaa-abati innee akhaafu aien yamassaka 'azaabum minar Rahmaani fatakoona lish-Shaitaani waliyyaa
translations.2: Ya abati innee akhafu an yamassaka AAathabun mina alrrahmani fatakoona lilshshyatani waliyyan

words.translation: He said|Do you hate|Do you hate|(from)|my gods|O Ibrahim|Surely, if|not|you desist|surely, I will stone you|so leave me|(for) a prolonged time

translations.1: Qaala araaghibun anta 'an aalihatee yaaa-Ibraaheemu la-'il lam tantahi la-arjumannaka wahjurnee maliyyaa
translations.2: Qala araghibun anta AAan alihatee ya ibraheemu lain lam tantahi laarjumannaka waohjurnee maliyyan

words.translation: He said|Peace (be)|on you|I will ask forgiveness|for you|(from) my Lord|Indeed He|is|to me|Ever Gracious

translations.1: Qaala salaamun 'alaika sa-astaghfiru laka Rabbeee innahoo kaana bee hafiyyaa
translations.2: Qala salamun AAalayka saastaghfiru laka rabbee innahu kana bee hafiyyan

words.translation: And I will leave you|and what|you invoke|besides|besides|Allah|and I will invoke|my Lord|May be|that not|I will be|in invocation|(to) my Lord|unblessed

translations.1: Wa-a'tazilukum Wa-maa tad'oona min doonil laahi Wa-ad'oo Rabbee 'asaaa allaaa akoona bidu'aaa'i Rabbee shaqiyyaa
translations.2: WaaAAtazilukum wama tadAAoona min dooni Allahi waadAAoo rabbee AAasa alla akoona biduAAai rabbee shaqiyyan

words.translation: So when|he left them|and what|they worshipped|besides Allah|besides Allah|besides Allah|[and] We bestowed|[to] him|Ishaq|and Yaqub|and each (of them)|We made|a Prophet

translations.1: Fa-lam ma'tazalahum Wa-maa ya'budoona min doonil laahi wahabnaa lahoo is-haaqa Wa-ya'qoob; Wa-kullan ja'alnaa Nabiyyaa
translations.2: Falamma iAAtazalahum wama yaAAbudoona min dooni Allahi wahabna lahu ishaqa wayaAAqooba wakullan jaAAalna nabiyyan

words.translation: And We bestowed|to them|of|Our Mercy|and We made|for them|a truthful mention|a truthful mention|high

translations.1: Wa wahabnaa lahum mirrahmatinaa Wa-ja'alnaa lahum lisaana sidqin 'aliyyaa
translations.2: Wawahabna lahum min rahmatina wajaAAalna lahum lisana sidqin AAaliyyan

words.translation: And mention|in|the Book|Musa|Indeed he|was|chosen|and was|a Messenger|a Prophet

translations.1: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Moosaaa; innahoo kaana mukhlasanw Wa-kaana Rasoolan Nabiyyaa
translations.2: Waothkur fee alkitabi moosa innahu kana mukhlasan wakana rasoolan nabiyyan

words.translation: And We called him|from|(the) side|(of) the Mount|the right|and brought him near|(for) conversation

translations.1: Wa-naadainaahu min jaanibit Tooril aimani Wa-qarrabnaahu najiyyaa
translations.2: Wanadaynahu min janibi alttoori alaymani waqarrabnahu najiyyan

words.translation: And We bestowed|[to] him|from|Our Mercy|his brother|Harun|a Prophet

translations.1: Wa-wahabnaa lahoo mir rahmatinaaa akhaahu Haaroona Nabiyyaa
translations.2: Wawahabna lahu min rahmatina akhahu haroona nabiyyan

words.translation: And mention|in|the Book|Ismail|Indeed he|was|true|(to his) promise|and was|a Messenger|a Prophet

translations.1: Wazkur fil Kitaabi ismaa'eel; innahoo kaana saadiqal wa'di Wa-kaana Rasoolan Nabiyyaa
translations.2: Waothkur fee alkitabi ismaAAeela innahu kana sadiqa alwaAAdi wakana rasoolan nabiyyan

words.translation: And he used|(to) enjoin|(on) his people|the prayer|and zakah|and was|near|his Lord|pleasing

translations.1: Wa-kaana ya'muru ahlahoo bis-Salaati waz-zakaati Wa-kaana 'inda Rabbihee mardiyyaa
translations.2: Wakana yamuru ahlahu bialssalati waalzzakati wakana AAinda rabbihi mardiyyan

words.translation: And mention|in|the Book|Idris|Indeed he|was|truthful|a Prophet

translations.1: Wazkur fil Kitaabi Idrees; innahoo kaana siddeeqan Nabiyyaa
translations.2: Waothkur fee alkitabi idreesa innahu kana siddeeqan nabiyyan

words.translation: And We raised him|(to) a position|high

translations.1: Wa-rafa'naahu makaanan 'aliyyaa
translations.2: WarafaAAnahu makanan AAaliyyan

words.translation: Those|(were) the ones whom|Allah bestowed favor|Allah bestowed favor|upon them|from (among)|the Prophets|of|(the) offspring|(of) Adam|and of those|We carried|with|Nuh|and of|(the) offspring|(of) Ibrahim|and Israel|and of (those) whom|We guided|and We chose|When|were recited|to them|(the) Verses|(of) the Most Gracious|they fell|prostrating|and weeping

translations.1: Ulaaa'ikal lazeena an'amal laahu 'alaihim minan Nabiyyeena min zurriyyati Aadama Wa-mimman hamalnaa ma'a Noohinw Wa-min zurriyyati Ibraaheema Wa-Israaa'eela Wa-mimman hadainaa wajta-bainaaa; izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatur Rahmaani kharroo sujjadanw Wa-bukiyyaa
translations.2: Olaika allatheena anAAama Allahu AAalayhim mina alnnabiyyeena min thurriyyati adama wamimman hamalna maAAa noohin wamin thurriyyati ibraheema waisraeela wamimman hadayna waijtabayna itha tutla AAalayhim ayatu alrrahmani kharroo sujjadan wabukiyyan

words.translation: Then succeeded|after them|after them|successors|who neglected|the prayer|and they followed|the lusts|so soon|they will meet|evil

translations.1: Fakhalafa min ba'dihim khalfun adaa'us Salaata wattaba'ush shahawaati fasawfa yalqawna ghaiyyaa
translations.2: Fakhalafa min baAAdihim khalfun adaAAoo alssalata waittabaAAoo alshshahawati fasawfa yalqawna ghayyan

words.translation: Except|(one) who|repented|and believed|and did|good (deeds)|Then those|will enter|Paradise|and not|they will be wronged|(in) anything

translations.1: Illaa man taaba Wa-aamana Wa-'amila saalihan fa-ulaaa'ika yadkhuloonal jannata Wa-laa yuzlamoona shai'aa
translations.2: Illa man taba waamana waAAamila salihan faolaika yadkhuloona aljannata wala yuthlamoona shayan

words.translation: Gardens|(of) Eden|which|promised|the Most Gracious|(to) His slaves|in the unseen|Indeed [it]|is|His promise|sure to come

translations.1: Jannaati 'adninil latee wa'adar Rahmaanu ibaadahoo bilghaib; innahoo kaana wa'duhoo ma'tiyyaa
translations.2: Jannati AAadnin allatee waAAada alrrahmanu AAibadahu bialghaybi innahu kana waAAduhu matiyyan

words.translation: Not|they will hear|therein|vain talk|but|peace|And for them|(is) their provision|therein|morning|and evening

translations.1: Laa yasma'oona feehaa laghwan illaa salaamaa; Wa-lahum rizquhum feehaa bukratanw Wa-'ashiyyaa
translations.2: La yasmaAAoona feeha laghwan illa salaman walahum rizquhum feeha bukratan waAAashiyyan

words.translation: This|(is) Paradise|which|We give (as) inheritance|[of] (to)|Our slaves|(the one) who|is|righteous

translations.1: Tilkal jannatul latee noorisu min 'ibaadinaa man kaana taqiyyaa
translations.2: Tilka aljannatu allatee noorithu min AAibadina man kana taqiyyan

words.translation: And not|we descend|except|by (the) Command|(of) your Lord|To Him (belongs)|what|(is) before us|(is) before us|and what|(is) behind us|and what|(is) between|that|And not|is|your Lord|forgetful

translations.1: Wa-maa natanazzalu illaa bi-amri Rabbika lahoo maa baina aideenaa Wa-maa khalfanaa Wa-maa baina zaalik; Wa-maa kaana Rabbuka nasiyyaa
translations.2: Wama natanazzalu illa biamri rabbika lahu ma bayna aydeena wama khalfana wama bayna thalika wama kana rabbuka nasiyyan

words.translation: Lord|(of) the heavens|and the earth|and whatever|(is) between both of them|so worship Him|and be constant|in His worship|Do|you know|for Him|any similarity

translations.1: Rabbus samaawaati wal-ardi Wa-maa bainahumaa fa'bud-hu wastabir li'ibaadatih; hal ta'lamu lahoo samiyyaa
translations.2: Rabbu alssamawati waalardi wama baynahuma faoAAbudhu waistabir liAAibadatihi hal taAAlamu lahu samiyyan

words.translation: And says|[the] man|What! When|What! When|I am dead|surely will|I be brought forth|alive

translations.1: Wa-yaqoolul insaanu 'a-izaa maa mittu lasawfa ukhraju haiyaa
translations.2: Wayaqoolu alinsanu aitha ma mittu lasawfa okhraju hayyan

words.translation: Does not|remember|[the] man|that We|We created him|before|before|while not|he was|anything

translations.1: A-Wa-laa yazkurul insaanu annaa khalaqnaahu min qablu Wa-lam yaku shai'aa
translations.2: Awala yathkuru alinsanu anna khalaqnahu min qablu walam yaku shayan

words.translation: So by your Lord|surely We will gather them|and the devils|then|surely We will bring them|around|Hell|bent (on) knees

translations.1: Fawa-Rabbika lanahshu-rannahum wash-shayaateena summa lanuhdirannahum hawla jahannama jisiyyaa
translations.2: Fawarabbika lanahshurannahum waalshshayateena thumma lanuhdirannahum hawla jahannama jithiyyan

words.translation: Then|surely We will drag out|from|every|sect|those of them|(who were) worst|against|the Most Gracious|(in) rebellion

translations.1: Summa lanan-zi'anna min kulli shee'atin aiyuhum ashaddu 'alar Rahmaani 'itiyyaa
translations.2: Thumma lananziAAanna min kulli sheeAAatin ayyuhum ashaddu AAala alrrahmani AAitiyyan

words.translation: Then|surely We|know best|[of] those who|[they]|(are) most worthy|therein|(of) being burnt

translations.1: Summa lanahnu a'lamu billazeena hum awlaa bihaa siliyyaa
translations.2: Thumma lanahnu aAAlamu biallatheena hum awla biha siliyyan

words.translation: And (there is) not|(any) of you|but|(will be) passing over it|(This) is|upon|your Lord|an inevitability|decreed

translations.1: Wa-in minkum illaa waariduhaa; kaana 'alaa Rabbika hatmam maqdiyyaa
translations.2: Wain minkum illa wariduha kana AAala rabbika hatman maqdiyyan

words.translation: Then|We will deliver|those who|feared (Allah)|and We will leave|the wrongdoers|therein|bent (on) knees

translations.1: Summa nunajjil lazeenat taqaw Wa-nazaruz zaalimeena feehaa jisiyyaa
translations.2: Thumma nunajjee allatheena ittaqaw wanatharu alththalimeena feeha jithiyyan

words.translation: And when|are recited|to them|Our Verses|clear|say|those who|disbelieved|to those who|believed|Which|(of) the two groups|(is) better|(in) position|and best|(in) assembly

translations.1: Wa-izaa tutlaa 'alaihim Aayaatunaa baiyinaatin qaalal lazeena kafaroo lillazeena aamanooo aiyul fareeqaini khairum maqaamanw Wa-ahsanu nadiyyaa
translations.2: Waitha tutla AAalayhim ayatuna bayyinatin qala allatheena kafaroo lillatheena amanoo ayyu alfareeqayni khayrun maqaman waahsanu nadiyyan

words.translation: And how many|We destroyed|before them|of|a generation|they|(were) better|(in) possessions|and appearance

translations.1: Wa-kam ahlaknaa qablahum min qarnin hum ahsanu asaasanw Wa-ri'yaa
translations.2: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hum ahsanu athathan wariyan

words.translation: Say|Whoever|is|in|[the] error|then surely will extend|for him|the Most Gracious|an extension|until|when|they see|what|they were promised|either|the punishment|or|the Hour|then they will know|who|[he]|(is) worst|(in) position|and weaker|(in) forces

translations.1: Qul man kaana fid da-laalati falyamdud lahur Rahmaanu maddaa; hattaaa izaa ra-aw maa yoo'adoona immal 'azaaba Wa-immas Saa'ata fasa-ya'lamoona man huwa sharrum makaananw Wa-ad'afu jundaa
translations.2: Qul man kana fee alddalalati falyamdud lahu alrrahmanu maddan hatta itha raaw ma yooAAadoona imma alAAathaba waimma alssaAAata fasayaAAlamoona man huwa sharrun makanan waadAAafu jundan

words.translation: And Allah increases|And Allah increases|those who|accept guidance|(in) guidance|And the everlasting|good deeds|(are) better|near|your Lord|(for) reward|and better|(for) return

translations.1: Wa-yazeedul laahul lazeenah tadaw hudaa; wal-baaqiyaatus saalihaatu khairun 'inda Rabbika sawaabanw Wa-khairum maraddaa
translations.2: Wayazeedu Allahu allatheena ihtadaw hudan waalbaqiyatu alssalihatu khayrun AAinda rabbika thawaban wakhayrun maraddan

words.translation: Then have you seen|he who|disbelieved|in Our Verses|and said|Surely I will be given|wealth|and children

translations.1: Afara'aytal lazee kafara bi-Aayaatinaa Wa-qaala la-oota-yanna maalanw Wa-waladaa
translations.2: Afaraayta allathee kafara biayatina waqala laootayanna malan wawaladan

words.translation: Has he looked|(into) the unseen|or|has he taken|from|the Most Gracious|a promise

translations.1: At-tala'al ghaiba 'amit takhaza 'indar Rahmaani 'ahdaa
translations.2: AttalaAAa alghayba ami ittakhatha AAinda alrrahmani AAahdan

words.translation: Nay|We will record|what|he says|and We will extend|for him|from|the punishment|extensively

translations.1: Kallaa; sanaktubu maa yaqoolu Wa-namuddu lahoo minal 'azaabi maddaa
translations.2: Kalla sanaktubu ma yaqoolu wanamuddu lahu mina alAAathabi maddan

words.translation: And We will inherit (from) him|what|he says|and he will come to Us|alone

translations.1: Wa-narisuhoo maa yaqoolu Wa-ya'teenaa fardaa
translations.2: Wanarithuhu ma yaqoolu wayateena fardan

words.translation: And they have taken|besides Allah|besides Allah|besides Allah|gods|that they may be|for them|an honor

translations.1: Wattakhazoo min doonil laahi aalihatal liyakoonoo lahum 'izzaa
translations.2: Waittakhathoo min dooni Allahi alihatan liyakoonoo lahum AAizzan

words.translation: Nay|they will deny|their worship (of them)|and they will be|against them|opponents

translations.1: Kallaa; sa-yakfuroona bi'ibaadatihim Wa-yakoonoona 'alaihim diddaa
translations.2: Kalla sayakfuroona biAAibadatihim wayakoonoona AAalayhim diddan

words.translation: Do not|you see|that We|[We] have sent|the devils|upon|the disbelievers|inciting them|(with) incitement

translations.1: Alam tara annaaa arsalnash Shayaateena 'alal kaafireena ta'uzzuhum azzaa
translations.2: Alam tara anna arsalna alshshayateena AAala alkafireena taozzuhum azzan

words.translation: So (do) not|make haste|against them|Only|We count|for them|a number

translations.1: Falaa ta'jal alaihim innamaa na-'uddu lahum 'addaa
translations.2: Fala taAAjal AAalayhim innama naAAuddu lahum AAaddan

words.translation: (The) Day|We will gather|the righteous|to|the Most Gracious|(as) a delegation

translations.1: Yawma nahshurul muttaqeena ilar Rahmaani wafdaa
translations.2: Yawma nahshuru almuttaqeena ila alrrahmani wafdan

words.translation: And We will drive|the criminals|to|Hell|thirsty

translations.1: Wa-nasooqul mujrimeena ilaa Jahannama wirdaa
translations.2: Wanasooqu almujrimeena ila jahannama wirdan

words.translation: Not|they will have the power|(of) the intercession|except|(he) who|has taken|from|the Most Gracious|a covenant

translations.1: Laa yamlikoonash shafaa'ata illaa manit takhaza 'indar Rahmaani 'ahdaa
translations.2: La yamlikoona alshshafaAAata illa mani ittakhatha AAinda alrrahmani AAahdan

words.translation: And they say|Has taken|the Most Gracious|a son

translations.1: Wa-qaalut takhazar Rahmaanu waladaa
translations.2: Waqaloo ittakhatha alrrahmanu waladan

words.translation: Verily|you have put forth|a thing|atrocious

translations.1: Laqad ji'tum shai'an iddaa
translations.2: Laqad jitum shayan iddan

words.translation: Almost|the heavens|get torn|therefrom|and splits asunder|the earth|and collapse|the mountain|(in) devastation

translations.1: Takaadus samaawaatu yatafattarna minhu Wa-tanshaq qul-ardu Wa-takhirrul jibaalu haddaa
translations.2: Takadu alssamawatu yatafattarna minhu watanshaqqu alardu watakhirru aljibalu haddan

words.translation: That|they invoke|to the Most Gracious|a son

translations.1: An da'aw lir-Rahmaani waladaa
translations.2: An daAAaw lilrrahmani waladan

words.translation: And not|is appropriate|for the Most Gracious|that|He should take|a son

translations.1: Wa-maa yambaghee li-Rahmaani aien yattakhiza waladaa
translations.2: Wama yanbaghee lilrrahmani an yattakhitha waladan

words.translation: Not|all|who|(are) in|the heavens|and the earth|but|(will) come|(to) the Most Gracious|(as) a slave

translations.1: In kullu man fis samaawaati wal-ardi illaaa aatir Rahmaani 'abdaa
translations.2: In kullu man fee alssamawati waalardi illa atee alrrahmani AAabdan

words.translation: Verily|He has enumerated them|and counted them|a counting

translations.1: Laqad ahsaahum Wa-addahum 'addaa
translations.2: Laqad ahsahum waAAaddahum AAaddan

words.translation: And all of them|(will) come (to) Him|(on the) Day|(of) the Resurrection|alone

translations.1: Wa-kulluhum aateehi Yawmal Qiyaamati fardaa
translations.2: Wakulluhum ateehi yawma alqiyamati fardan

words.translation: Indeed|those who|believed|and did|good deeds|will bestow|for them|the Most Gracious|affection

translations.1: Innal lazeena aamanoo Wa-'amilus saalihaati sa-yaj'alu lahumur Rahmaanu wuddaa
translations.2: Inna allatheena amanoo waAAamiloo alssalihati sayajAAalu lahumu alrrahmanu wuddan

words.translation: So only|We (have) made it easy|in your tongue|that you may give glad tidings|with it|(to) the righteous|and warn|with it|a people|hostile

translations.1: Fa-innamaa yassarnaahu bilisaanika litubashshira bihil muttaqeena Wa-tunzira bihee qawmal luddaa
translations.2: Fainnama yassarnahu bilisanika litubashshira bihi almuttaqeena watunthira bihi qawman luddan

words.translation: And how many|We (have) destroyed|before them|of|a generation|Can|you perceive|of them|any|one|or|hear|from them|a sound

translations.1: Wa-kam ahlaknaa qabla-hum min qarnin hal tuhissu minhum min ahadin aw tasma'u lahum rikzaa
translations.2: Wakam ahlakna qablahum min qarnin hal tuhissu minhum min ahadin aw tasmaAAu lahum rikzan
